welcome.title: Welcome to AstrBot Plugin Manager
welcome.subtitle: Select a plugin to view details, or install more extensions from the marketplace
welcome.body:
AstrBot is a powerful chatbot framework that supports multiple platforms and models.
With the plugin system, you can easily extend AstrBot‚Äôs capabilities.

## Quick Start
- Select a plugin from the left list to view details
- Use the ‚ÄúInfo / Configuration / Overview‚Äù tabs to check configuration, documentation and updates
- Use the top toolbar to install new plugins or batch update

## Links
- GitHub: https://github.com/AstrBotDevs/AstrBot
- Docs: https://astrbot.app/

errors.fetchFailed: Failed to load documentation. Please check your network connection.
errors.rateLimited: GitHub API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.

empty.title: No content available.
empty.subtitle: Please retry later or view it on GitHub.

tip.market: Marketplace: click the ‚ÄúExtension Market‚Äù tab on the top to browse and install plugins.

errors.fetchError: An error occurred while fetching changelog

empty.title: No changelog available for this plugin.
empty.subtitle: Developers can add a CHANGELOG.md file in the plugin directory to provide changelog.

empty.noPluginsDesc: Try installing extensions or showing system extensions

market.confirmRemoveSource: Are you sure you want to remove this source?

uninstall.title: Confirm Deletion
uninstall.message: Are you sure you want to delete this extension?
uninstall.configHint: Configuration file located in data/config directory
uninstall.dataHint: Deletes data in data/plugin_data and data/plugins_data

danger_warning.title: Dangerous Plugin Warning
danger_warning.message: This plugin has been flagged as containing security risks, including unsafe code or functionalities that may cause system malfunctions or data loss. Do you wish to proceed with the installation?

forceUpdate.title: No New Version Detected
forceUpdate.message: No new version detected for this plugin. Do you want to force reinstall? This will pull the latest code from the remote repository.

messages.refreshFailed: Error occurred while refreshing extension list
messages.getMarketDataFailed: Failed to get extension market data:
messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this extension?
messages.fillUrlOrFile: Please fill in extension URL or upload extension file
messages.dontFillBoth: Please don't fill in both extension URL and upload file
messages.updateAllSuccess: All upgradable extensions have been updated!
messages.fillSourceNameAndUrl: Please fill in the complete source name and URL
messages.enterJsonUrl: Please enter a URL that returns plugin list JSON data

conflicts.title: Command Conflicts Detected
conflicts.message: This will cause some commands to work abnormally. It is recommended to go to the [Command Management] panel to handle it.

tabs.pipelineTooltip: Shows which plugin handlers participate in each stage and highlights static risk markers. Useful for diagnosing conflicts and locating handlers. This is snapshot analysis output, not runtime logs.
tabs.traceTooltip: Uses static analysis to infer which internal fields plugins may affect, aggregated by impact target and stage. Great for tracing back from an "affected field" to possible source plugins. Not the same as a real runtime execution trace.

detail.noStageSelectedHint: Select a stage from the fishbone on the left
detail.noParticipantsHint: No plugins participated in this stage

filters.onlyHighImpactTooltip: Only for narrowing down investigation scope: overwrite, clear, list mutation, stop, send, etc. will be marked as key impacts; it does not mean it definitely happens or is definitely a problem.
filters.targetObjectTooltip: Filters by "affected field". For example, select system_prompt to see which plugins may rewrite the system prompt.

promptPreview.title: Prompt Preview
promptPreview.emptyHint: This snapshot does not contain prompt preview information
promptPreview.overwriteWarn: Multiple overwrite operations detected; final prompt may be overwritten and order may be unstable.
promptPreview.simulatedInputHint: Helps the preview render closer to real requests; it will not be used to search or filter the plugin list.
promptPreview.contextsTooltip: This preview does not inject runtime contexts (e.g., message history, external retrieval results), so "context-related injections/concats" may be empty or not visible.
promptPreview.injectedByTooltip: A statically inferred list of sources that may contribute to the injection chain, used to trace which handlers may affect prompt/system_prompt/persona_prompt.
promptPreview.dryRunHandlersTooltip: Runs a safe preview for request-stage only to detect potential overwrites/intercepts/warnings; it does not simulate a full end-to-end execution.
promptPreview.renderWarningsTooltip: Warnings and reasons found during preview rendering/preview execution, e.g., actions blocked by security policy or cases where rendering cannot complete.
promptPreview.stopTooltip: This handler may stop the event chain during preview
promptPreview.blockedTooltip: Actions blocked by preview policy and reasons (e.g., send/request_llm)

traceDetail.title: Impact Point Detail
traceDetail.filterByTarget: View other points for this target
traceDetail.staticAnalysisNote: These are statically inferred possible impacts, not runtime logs
